name: community-project
description: ## Getting Started - ``` git clone https://github.com/rbrtbrnschn/community-project.git ``` - ``` cd community-project ``` - ``` npm i ``` - rename SAMPLE.env to .env

scripts.dev-install: concurrently "npm i" "cd server && npm i" "cd client && npm i"
scripts.dev-start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
